services: Online auction management (timed, racehorse-style, click-to-claim, live view)
Sale booking and lot management (self-service seller tools)
After-sale accounting and consignor settlement (7-14 days)
Watch list with green/red bid status and flash alerts
Extended bidding (5-minute extension on late bids)
The Show Circuit Magazine advertising (print + digital)
eBlast marketing and social media promotion

history.event: Roland Schumaker founds The Show Circuit Magazine — livestock industry publication
SC Online Sales LLC launched by Dave Guyer and Roland Schumaker in Robinson, IL
Platform reaches 10,000+ registered users and 220,000 bids
Q1 page views reach 9.3 million (166% growth over prior year)
COVID pivot — virtual show platform for cancelled county fairs (4-H/FFA)
Swine division formalized under Kelton Mason. Sheep/goat division rapid growth.
40,000+ total auctions conducted. 5 species. 25+ team members nationwide.
